question: The anti-ship version of which missile was recently test-fired by the Indian Navy in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands territory?
explanation: The Indian Navy test-fired the anti-ship version of the Brahmos supersonic cruise missile in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands territory. This successful test is a part of series of trials being carried out by the three services. Brahmos is a joint venture ofÂ  India and Russia aimed at producing lethal weapons.
